We have compiled a detailed report on #Cuddalore It will hopefully help all of us understand and help #Cuddalore district better. Tomorrow.
Important Announcement. #ChennaiMicro Next course of action. @RJ_Balaji
Sitting with @RJ_Balaji and meeting #ChennaiMicro rehabilitation partners. Will make all our announcements through social media tonight.
Please - do not send overseas funds for #ChennaiMicro to #Vtrust That's for domestic funding only. We will post a new A/C for overseas soon.
Any overseas donations to #ChennaiMicro through V Trust will be reversed. Will post new International a/c info to send foreign funds soon.
V Trust account is for India donations to #ChennaiMicro People looking to send funds from abroad, we will post FCRA registered a/c today.
We are personally handling over 20 trucks to Cuddalore. Breaking them up into small loads. Targeting worst affected first. Rest assured.
Posting details of villages that need supplies in #Cuddalore. Will also pass on storing locations to send supplies to volunteers there.
@RJ_Balaji and I are regrouping to figure out the best way forward for #ChennaiMicro Rehabilitation & long term impact is the focus.
I said cuddalore needs help. It's just not the disaster zone people are making it out to be. We have an (cont) http://tl.gd/n_1so0fq1
Back from Cuddalore. Learnings. 1.Send bedding and blankets, Mosquito (cont) http://tl.gd/n_1so0fnc
Food is not the priority. Water is receding. Life is returning to normal. Donate bedsheets, candles, insect repellent, water. #chennaimicro
Please form your own teams collect items and head to relief areas yourself if possible. We are already operating at full capacity. Do it!
AGS stock center is full. Use Hyatt Regency Teynampet, Christian king school tambaram or big fm office for drops. #chennaimicro @RJ_Balaji
Pouring in Chennai. Please stay indoors. Unless you are in teams do not head out for rescue or relief work. Contact #ChennaiMicro for help.
Heavy rain expected today. Tomorrow hopefully it'll move away to other areas in the sea. Hope this is the last of the rain. Pray it stops.
Please spread the word. Volunteers need to protect themselves. Tetanus shot. Careful of open wounds. Skin diseases are common. Be safe.
Urgent. Women's undergarments are bring requested in all areas. Sanitary napkins are in good supply. Please donate undergarments in bulk.
Vignesh Sivan, Archana Kalpathi, Chinmayi, Rahul, SA Arvind...holding fort with our 100s of volunteers #chennaimicro tomorrow. Rockstars!
Thank you Mukund from Google for setting up out WiFi for our information team. Really helped. #ChennaiMicro
Thank you @divyaspandana @ActorMadhavan and @RanaDaggubati for support to #ChennaiMicro
We have a strict no photo or video rule at #ChennaiMicro But we have an important video message from @RJ_Balaji coming up. Will post.
Taking 4 truckloads of supplies to #Cuddalore tomorrow. We will be reaching affected areas in the interiors. Hope for the best. #TNflood
Last truck sent out for the night. Volunteers outdid themselves today. Tomorrow will be better. Thank you for all the support. #ChennaiMicro
@Udhaystalin thank you for your unbelievable support brother. You and Mahesh have been amazing. God bless you. #ChennaiMicro @RJ_Balaji

Going to cuddalore tomorrow with a truckload of supplies. #ChennaiMicro large requirement areas info in cuddalore. Ngo support requested.
Our stocks are full for the day. And our one working phone is officially dead. Rains have stopped. Thank you for helping #Chennai Last leg!
Heading out now. Will connect at night. Please support #ChennaiMicro and help the relief work. This will be over soon. Pray. @RJ_Balaji
Use hashtag #ChennaiMicro for verified supplies info. Volunteers are tracking this hashtag. Please share contact no. Post responsibly.

@RJ_Balaji & I are on ground with over a hundred volunteers for food water amenities related rescue. Help. Send supplies. #ChennaiMicro

Only packaged food and snacks today PLEASE. Water bottles priority. Also lots of areas still need blankets. Please help. #ChennaiMicro
My volunteers have Internet access all day today. Thanks @SPIcinemas Please tweet supply availability. We will send teams to pick up.
Back in connectivity. We have trucks and vehicles going out all day today. Please use #ChennaiMicro to reach us. We need more supplies.
@imKBRshanthnu big fm office da. As much as we can get. Water is running short.
Need 10000 bottles of water urgently. Please send to Big fm office. We are there. Or tweet #ChennaiMicro we will come pick it up.

@vikiKadarkarai contact number please. I will have it picked up.

10 vehicles doing bedding and food water drops from 3pm. Come on #Chennai we need more. Blankets priority! #ChennaiMicro
Please tag @archanakalpathi for immediate response from #ChennaiMicro and to reach me or @RJ_Balaji She is holding fort till 5pm. #TNflood
No network. Putting up #ChennaiMicro volunteer team info. Tweet me. Also call them of they are near you. Food water blankets. Please.
Volunteer team needed in Anna Nagar. Urgent. Please contact. #ChennaiMicro
Contact @RJ_Balaji me and our team with hashtag #ChennaiMicro DO NOT RT RANDOMLY. ONLY VERIFIED DONORS AND INFO PLEASE.

We have more vehicles tomorrow and we have a bigger team. It will be a better day. Stay strong #Chennai Please help us. #chennaimicro

If you see people in water, please drop them to dry land. If there's any way you can drive around please do. Help the relief work. #TNflood
driving around doing pickups and drips tomorrow. Currently food and clothing are secondary. Transport is first priority. Please RT #TNflood
Please send tweets to @rj_balaji & me. We are trying to contact groups to spread information for stranded people. Every message/call counts.
Relief operations by army and navy in many areas. Thank you. In the meantime...look out your window. If you spot anyone reach out. #TNflood
Thank you SPI and AGS cinemas for opening doors for the affected. God bless you. #TNflood #Chennai
Will talk to all national media channels tomorrow. This cannot go under the radar. The worst flood in a century in #TAMILNADU we need help.
It's official. We're now a disaster zone!Army deployed. DO NOT LEAVE YOUR HOME. it's going to get MUCH WORSE! God show mercy on us. #TNflood
My beautiful niece Arya smiled through all the chaos. Hopefully when she grows up we'll be better prepared. #TNflood
Many people died in their cars in the Bombay floods because power windows and central locking jammed. Don't sit in broken down cars. #flood
If you see anyone stuck in a broken down car waiting for the #rain to stop... Please evacuate them to higher ground. It is very unsafe.
Just spoke on CNN-IBN ... If you are a concerned Indian please tell everybody you know about #TamilNadu. This is a disaster. We are sinking.
Bathrooms submerged. Water coming out of the drains. I am an affluent actor. This is my house. Imagine rest of TN.
House flooded. Moving to the terrace. God save Tamil Nadu.
Power grids have been shut down for safety reasons. No power till rain stops. We are now in darkness. This is depressing. Over and out.
